channel.title: Making where same ip cant log in
channel.description: i need help to make it where the same ip cant log in the same ip or at least cant trade the same ip. i want to make a better economy so people wont trade for starter's. can someone gimi a link to a tut on this or just post a comment on how to do it. i have a 508+ server.

item.title: Making where same ip cant log in
item.dc:creator: @voodoo74502 voodoo74502
item.description:
@voodoo74502 wrote:

rofl i have no idea is there just some simple way to make it where only one ipconnection can connect to my server preventing those who wish to x-fer starter’s.

Read full topic
item.source: Making where same ip cant log in

item.title: Making where same ip cant log in
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:352561”]Thread per client.

Google it.[/quote]

This.

voodoo74502:

well i didnt find any thing about same ip. can you give me a link please.?

Thread Per Client isn’t just for stopping multiple log in users, it is also a major fix to the new thread creation that all Wl servers do, when a player logs in a new thread is start to be dedicated to that user, 1 problem with that is if players start getting messed up the server can crash because or data corruption. You can take the IOHost.java out of the TPC fix and add it to a regular server with a few changes to the Server.java.

Read full topic
